family.name: DS54
family.comment: DS54 is a stationary decoder, but it can be programmed in the usual way

family.name: ESU LokSound V3.0 Silent BEMF/Sound decoders
Lenz Gold with 6th gen BEMF
family.comment: Decoders featuring Precision Braking Control and Low Gear Switching Drive

family.name: Lenz Ultra-Drive decoders
family.comment: Decoders featuring Precision Braking Control and Low Gear Switching Drive

family.name: ACC Decoders
family.comment: DCCACC4 is a standard MERG stationary decoder, but the software has been modified so that it can be programmed via CV1 to 33 and/or CV513 to 545. There is also a Lenz Toggle Mode for compatability with Lenz Systems.

family.name: DCCACC
family.comment: DCCACC is a stationary decoder, but it can be programmed in the usual way

family.name: Silent Drive decoders
family.comment: These are the version 3.0-3.4 Silent Running decoders

family.name: Silent Running w/ Torque Compensation
family.comment: These are the version 3.5 decoders released after September 2003
